name: widi/filter-specification
description: Specification pattern for filtering objects in php.

scripts.check-compat: for VERSION in 7.4 8.0 8.1;do ./vendor/bin/phpcs -- --colors --report=csv --report-file=data/core-compat-$VERSION.csv -p --extensions=php,phtml . --ignore=api,vendor,data --standard=PHPCompatibility --runtime-set installed_paths vendor/phpcompatibility/php-compatibility/PHPCompatibility --runtime-set testVersion $VERSION ; done
